name: Command & Control 3
description:
Assume the role of a special forces commander, fighting against a terrorist organization named "Dawn of Freedom".
You can fight against terrorists in two single-player campaigns: for NATO, led by the United States, and for the CSTO, led by Russia.
Fight in a multiplayer game with up to 10 players on each side.
You don't need to build a base. Form a company of squads and lead them to victory.
At your disposal:
assaults;
machine gunners;
snipers;
grenadiers;
tanks.
If you don't want to risk the lives of your soldiers, use fire support. Available to you:
mortar;
howitzer;
multiple launch rocket system;
attack helicopter;
attack aircraft;
cruise missile.
Combine units in squads, conduct artillery preparation, attack from an unexpected position, look for gaps in the enemy's defense.
Success or failure depends solely on your decisions.
